LaunchKit

Provides everything you need to quickly get a promotional site for your mobile app up and running.

Just add your images, text, and branding!

Quick Summary of Key Features

And a longer summary. Or you can delete this if you want, because this template is fully customizable.

First great app feature!

Appster/Apply/App.io will help you run faster/swim farther/jump higher/take better photographs.

You can very easily edit the picture on the left to show your app in action. Images are located at app/images once you download the source.

Fully Responsive Design! (Or another feature that you want to promote)

The LaunchKit template was developed from the ground up to be a retina-friendly, fully responsive template. Which means that it will serve a quality user experience on any screen or device.

Of course, this template is standards-compliant while leveraging the newest HTML5 and CSS3 technologies.

Transition to the next section
